gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 118, Spurs 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Spurs, 118-113. Duncan Robinson led all scorers with 26 points (4-7 3PM), along with five rebounds and four assists for the Heat, while Bam Adebayo added 24 points, 11 rebounds, six assists and three steals in the victory. Keldon Johnson tallied a team-high 20 points, along with 12 rebounds and 6 assists for the Spurs in the losing effort. The Heat have won five consecutive games as they improve to 6-4 on the season, while the Spurs fall to 3-7.
